What did Linda and Chris recommend to us?
utterance.kb: My husband and I spent a night here during a tour around the wine regions of France. My husband had spent a few days here whilst on a wine course a few months earlier and loved it so much he wanted to return to show it to me. I could easily see what he saw in this lovely wine orientated guest house. The auberge was charming with a wonderful pool. Our room was clean and comfortable with a private bathroom across the landing. There were views of nearby mountains and the local town only a 10 minute drive away. We dined at Chez Gerard which was recommended by Linda and Chris and lived up to expectations. Linda and Chris were very friendly and helpful. Already knowing my husband from his previous visit they made us feel like returning friends and went out of their way to help us. No doubt we be returning again!

utterance.nlg: Linda and Chris were very friendly and helpful.

utterance.nlg: What did the staff at Bombay Peggy's like to do?
utterance.kb: We have stayed at Bombay Peggy's in both the purple and green rooms. Both stays were wonderful! The Inn is thoughtfully decorated and the service is impeccable. Staff are attentive, but not smothering for such a small Inn. The green room is on the second floor and absolutely lovely. It is a little more spacious then the purple room, which was on the main floor next to the pub. We thought that it might be a bit noisy, but were pleasantly surprised that we didn't hear a peep from the pub over the weekend (it also closes at 1am so that's not too bad). Regardless, the pub is amazing! Even if we had heard some noise, it would have been worth it to be next to such a great place for cocktails! They are offering a local charcuterie board at the pub from 5-7pm throughout the summer, and it is amazing! Fresh croissants delivered to your room each morning too. Would definitely recommend to people looking to enjoy Dawson City as a truly relaxing (and romantic) vacation!

utterance.nlg: We have stayed at Bombay Peggy's in both the purple and green rooms.
